name: __EWidgetInteractionSource
doc:
The interaction source for the widget interaction component, e.g. where do we try and
trace from to try to find a widget under a virtual pointer device.

World: Sends traces from the world location and orientation of the interaction component.
Mouse: Sends traces from the mouse location of the first local player controller.
CenterScreen: Sends trace from the center of the first local player's screen.
Custom:
Sends traces from a custom location determined by the user.  Will use whatever
FHitResult is set by the call to SetCustomHitResult.
